title: I Pitches
stimulusHtml:
16 points

Pitches (16 points)

A. Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration.

B. Award full credit for octave transpositions of the correct bass pitch.

C. No enharmonic equivalents are allowed.

title: II Chord Symbols
stimulusHtml:
Chord Symbols (8 points)

A. Award 1 point for each chord symbol correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

B. Award 1/2 point for each correct Roman numeral that has an incorrect or missing Arabic numeral.

C. Accept the correct Roman numeral regardless of its case.
descriptions:

title: III Special Scoring Issues
stimulusHtml:
III. Special Scoring Issues

Round any fractional score up to the next higher point.
(Exception: Round 23 down to 23 points).

0 Response demonstrates an attempt to answer the question but has no redeeming qualities.
